survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with the technology tools provided for telecommuting and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which of the following telecommuting technology tools do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Video conferencing software (e.g., Zoom, Microsoft Teams)
Cloud storage services (e.g., Google Drive, Dropbox)
